headline.main: Robot hits the notes in Berlin Opera
headline.sub: Robot hits the notes in Berlin Opera

docs.snippet: A small robot will premiere June 21 in "My Square Lady", an opera performance at Berlin's Komische Oper, where he attempts to learn human emotions. Jillian Kitchener reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: A small robot will premiere June 21 in "My Square Lady", an opera performance at Berlin's Komische Oper, where he attempts to learn human emotions. Jillian Kitchener reports.

headline.main: Tim Robbins Takes in Emporio Armani as Fashion Week Opens
headline.print_headline: Tim Robbins Takes in Emporio Armani as Fashion Week Opens

docs.snippet: Italy's fashion capital is getting a little more traffic than usual as Milan Fashion Week kicks off, thanks to the Expo 2015 world's fair at the city's gates, now in its second month....
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy's fashion capital is getting a little more traffic than usual as Milan Fashion Week kicks off, thanks to the Expo 2015 world's fair at the city's gates, now in its second month.

headline.main: 'You Are Welcome:' The Night Emanuel Opened Its Door to Evil
headline.print_headline: 'You Are Welcome:' The Night Emanuel Opened Its Door to Evil

docs.snippet: When Angela Brown saw the Facebook post about a shooting at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church, her mind immediately leapt to her aunt. Whenever the doors to Emanuel were open to its flock, Ethel Lance was there....
docs.lead_paragraph: When Angela Brown saw the Facebook post about a shooting at Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church, her mind immediately leapt to her aunt. Whenever the doors to Emanuel were open to its flock, Ethel Lance was there.

headline.main: Anderson Beats Simon to Reach Queen's Club Final
headline.print_headline: Anderson Beats Simon to Reach Queen's Club Final

docs.snippet: Top-seeded Andy Murray's bid to reach the final at Queen's Club ended in frustration on Saturday when his semifinal against Serbia's Viktor Troicki was suspended in the first set due to rain....
docs.lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Andy Murray's bid to reach the final at Queen's Club ended in frustration on Saturday when his semifinal against Serbia's Viktor Troicki was suspended in the first set due to rain.

headline.main: Half a Century on, Carnage in Charleston Resonates in the South
headline.print_headline: Half a Century on, Carnage in Charleston Resonates in the South

docs.snippet: A half century ago in this deeply southern city, a racially motivated attack on a black church left four young girls dead and helped galvanize a civil rights movement that changed voting laws across the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: A half century ago in this deeply southern city, a racially motivated attack on a black church left four young girls dead and helped galvanize a civil rights movement that changed voting laws across the United States.

headline.main: $700 Million Plan to Help Salmon Habitat Faces New Challenge
headline.print_headline: $700 Million Plan to Help Salmon Habitat Faces New Challenge

docs.snippet: A massive federal habitat restoration effort in the Columbia River Basin has spent more than $700 million on breaching levies, restoring tidal channels, reconnecting floodplains and other actions meant to boost salmon and steelhead populations imp...
docs.lead_paragraph: A massive federal habitat restoration effort in the Columbia River Basin has spent more than $700 million on breaching levies, restoring tidal channels, reconnecting floodplains and other actions meant to boost salmon and steelhead populations imperiled by hydroelectric dams.
